profile.greeting: Welcome to Epichost {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to a great automated messaging experience. if there something we should improve feel free to comment with #suggestion

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to Epichost,  One stop destination for all web services you need.
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the options.
get_started.help: What we can do to help you today?

curation.prompt: What kind of service you are looking for?
curation.register: Please visit https://www.epichost.in/domain_search/ to register your domain.
curation.title: Summer collection 2019
curation.subtitle: Featured product
curation.infossl: Secure socket layers, safer and secure always with https://. Starts at â‚¹599 per year.

care.prompt: To connect you with the right team please let me know what this is about?
care.issue: Hi {{userFirstName}}, Please write your query or issue followed by #support,& We will get back to you soon..
care.default: Hi {{userFirstName}}, Please write your query or issue followed by #support, & We will get back to you soon..
care.style: Hi {{userFirstName}}, Please write your query or issue followed by #support, & We will get back to you soon..
care.end: You can also write us at support@epichost.in.

survey.prompt: Hi, want to get quick feedback on your recent experience.
survey.neutral: Thanks for the feedback, if there something we should improve feel free to comment with #suggestion
survey.negative: Thanks for telling us. Sorry to hear that, if there something we can do to turn this let us know
survey.suggestion: Your suggestion has been recorded for future review by the team.
survey.support: Thank you, We will get back to you soon..

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
